formOptions.cancellingOption.areYouSure:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation question for subscription cancellation
**UI Location**: Donations → Subscription Form → Cancelling Option modal
**When Users See This**: When attempting to cancel a recurring donation
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to cancel your recurring donation?"
formOptions.cancellingOption.yesPleaseCa:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to confirm and proceed with cancellation
**UI Location**: Donations → Subscription Form → Cancelling Option modal
**When Users See This**: When the user has clicked to cancel their subscription and sees the confirmation prompt
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Yes - please cancel it."
formOptions.cancellingOption.noCloseThis:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to close the cancellation prompt without cancelling
**UI Location**: Donations → Subscription Form → Cancelling Option modal
**When Users See This**: When the user sees the confirmation prompt for cancelling their subscription and decides not to proceed
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "No, close this."
